unit.name: Slavebringer Assault Boat
specialRules: Transport (May carry up to eight of the following: Warlock, Farseer, Guardian, Wraithguard, Ranger, Pathfinder, Heavy Weapon Platform, Support Weapon Platform, Howling Banshee, Striking Scorpion, Fire Dragon, Dire Avenger, Dark Reaper, Warp Spider & Swooping Hawk units).
Critical Hit Effect: The Vampire and all on board are destroyed.

unit.name: Executioner Assault Ship
specialRules: Transport: may carry up to twelve of the following units: Warrior, Incubi, Haemonculi, Hellion, Mandrakes, Grotesques, Scourge, Wrack, Warp Beasts and Wych units.
Critical Hit Effect: The Exercutioner crashes to the ground and is destroyed along with all on board.

unit.name: Torture Class Cruiser
specialRules: Transport (may carry up to one Executioner Assault Ship and two Slavebringer Assault Boats; or up to four Slavebringer Assault Boats, plus the troops carried in them.
